dcterms:description: The dataset is used for detecting counterfactual statements in text, focusing on identifying specific sentence types that imply causal reasoning.

dcterms:description: The BECauSE Corpus 2.0 is used for annotating causality and overlapping relations in text, providing a resource for understanding causal language.
dcterms:title: BECauSE Corpus 2.0

dcterms:description: The NLP4IF-2019 Shared Task Dataset is utilized for fine-grained propaganda detection, providing a benchmark for evaluating models in this area.
dcterms:title: NLP4IF-2019 Shared Task Dataset
